quotes.author: Martin Fowler
quotes.quote: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.

quotes.author: Pablo Picasso
quotes.quote: Computers are useless, they can only give you answers.

quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra
quotes.quote: If debugging is the process of removing software bugs, then programming must be the process of putting them in.

quotes.author: Larry Wall
quotes.quote: Most of you are familiar with the virtues of a programmer. There are three, of course: laziness, impatience and hubris.

quotes.author: Bjarne Stroustrup
quotes.quote: There's an old story about the person who wished his computer were as easy to use as his telephone. That wish as come true, since I no longer know how to use my telephone.

quotes.author: Joseph Campbell
quotes.quote: Computers are like Old Testament gods; lots of rules and no mercy.

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.quote: Measuring programming progress by lines of code is like measuring aircraft building by weight.

quotes.author: Eric S. Raymond
quotes.quote: Computer Science education cannot make anybody an expert programmer any more than studying brushes and pigments can make somebody an expert painter.

quotes.author: Jim Horning
quotes.quote: Computer Science is the only discipline in which we view adding a new wing to a building as being maintenance.
